    | text      = I'm going to ask you really quick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:59.460
    | text      = An organization that has no problem genetically creating children,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:03.460
    | text      = secretly implanting them into host bodies,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:07.460
    | text      = than stealing them when they are four.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:11.460
    | text      = I don't understand why they're a real hung up on the payment part.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:14.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:15.460
    | text      = Or pay you in gold or something like Bitcoin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:18.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:19.460
    | text      = You can get paid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:20.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:21.460
    | text      = You can weave this into the narrative.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:22.460
    | text      = There's untraceable money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:23.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:24.460
    | text      = So this leads to Howard making a joke.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:26.460
    | text      = Do me a favor, Randy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:27.460
    | text      = Don't tell any radio station that explanation for why you shouldn't be paid
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:31.460
    | text      = because they're all going to be using it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:34.460
    | text      = You know, I've got bills to pay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:36.460
    | text      = Damn charming guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:37.460
    | text      = He's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:38.460
    | text      = That's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:39.460
    | text      = So he asks Randy because this is really hard as a pill to swallow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:42.460
    | text      = My capitalist overlords would love to treat me like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:45.460
    | text      = You, Randy, are working for Space Army.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:51.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:52.460
    | text      = You're doing PR work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:54.460
    | text      = You're a detective for paranormal shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:56.460
    | text      = I'm a good one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:57.460
    | text      = You're not getting paid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:58.460
    | text      = Why would I?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:14:59.460
    | text      = Do you have a contract?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:00.460
    | text      = That's a good question.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:01.460
    | text      = Have you got a contract that you can read like a piece of paper with these people?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:04.460
    | text      = Not in front of me that I could show you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:06.460
    | text      = I mean, let me put it this way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:08.460
    | text      = In a box somewhere in a vault that my records exist and then there is a contract.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:13.460
    | text      = I'm going through a process to try and get them, but I don't expect it to happen soon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:18.460
    | text      = Yeah, me neither.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:19.460
    | text      = I'm trying to get my legal documents, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:23.460
    | text      = But every time I ask my Brigadier General, he's like, go back to PR work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:27.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:28.460
    | text      = It's in a box somewhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:30.460
    | text      = Great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:31.460
    | text      = Whatever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:32.460
    | text      = It's in the Ark of the Covenant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:33.460
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:34.460
    | text      = I was going to say it's a big warehouse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:36.460
    | text      = So we've basically gotten where we're going to get on this line of questioning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:40.460
    | text      = Pretty much, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:41.460
    | text      = And so Howard moves it over to talking about, what's it like on Mars?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:46.460
    | text      = What's it like to be on the surface of Mars?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:51.460
    | text      = Well, the gravity is less than half.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:54.460
    | text      = It's about 0.4, so it's much lighter, that's for sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:00.460
    | text      = And that's why you have the extra strength then, presumably?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:03.460
    | text      = Well, I mean, first of all, we're there in an augmented powered body armor environment suit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:15.460
    | text      = So not only do you have the ability to sort of jump higher and throw things farther,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:20.460
    | text      = you're in a powered body armor, so you can even jump higher and farther and throw things farther.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:26.460
    | text      = So it's a little crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:29.460
    | text      = But you're not allowed to bring that back with you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:31.460
    | text      = Oh, heck no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:33.460
    | text      = Nope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:34.460
    | text      = Also, why are you so focused on throwing things?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:38.460
    | text      = How much throwing are you doing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:39.460
    | text      = Well, because he works on a baseball diamond most of the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:42.460
    | text      = I could be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:43.460
    | text      = I think this is indicative of one thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:46.460
    | text      = Everyone who's in the space weirdo interviewing community,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:51.460
    | text      = whether consciously or instinctively, knows what questions not to ask.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:16:56.460
    | text      = Because he's really thrown off by a lot of these very, very simple questions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:00.460
    | text      = These basic questions?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:01.460
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, just like, you can hear him when he's like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:04.460
    | text      = Well, when he's in his element, he's, snap, I got my prepared responses.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:11.460
    | text      = Let me offer Randy a little bit of an out on that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:14.460
    | text      = If I had been on Mars and you asked me what's it like on Mars,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:18.460
    | text      = that's such an open question that it might take a second to be like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:22.460
    | text      = Well, the gravity is different.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:24.460
    | text      = Fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:25.460
    | text      = It's like, what's it like in Chicago?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:28.460
    | text      = You know, it's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:29.460
    | text      = See, you paused.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:30.460
    | text      = It's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:31.460
    | text      = Yeah, you didn't have a quick answer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:32.460
    | text      = That's fair, that's fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:33.460
    | text      = It's a broad topic that you don't have an easy, immediate, satisfying answer for.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:39.460
    | text      = Yeah, I wouldn't say the gravity's normal here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:41.460
    | text      = Sure is, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:44.460
    | text      = Yes, it is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:45.460
    | text      = Also, another thing that Randy got to do while he was in space
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:48.460
    | text      = was he got to go to some intergalactic negotiations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:52.460
    | text      = Steve Paciorek was there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:53.460
    | text      = Yep, he was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:55.460
    | text      = He was there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:17:56.460
    | text      = Mike down for this because it ends with my favorite question that Howard asks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:00.460
    | text      = While I was on the Nautilus, I was very, very, very, very fortunate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:04.460
    | text      = on a number of missions to the Intergalactic Space Station,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:08.460
    | text      = not the International Space Station, the Intergalactic Space Station
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:11.460
    | text      = that rotates around Jupiter, which is a meeting place for a number of species
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:15.460
    | text      = from all over the place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:17.460
    | text      = We meet there, other people meet there to have some really fascinating discussions,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:21.460
    | text      = mostly diplomatic arrangements, contract negotiations, et cetera,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:25.460
    | text      = treaty negotiations, and on a number of occasions,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:28.460
    | text      = I would tag along basically as one of the only flight officers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:33.460
    | text      = with hand-to-hand combat experience.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:35.460
    | text      = I was a just-in-case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:36.460
    | text      = Even though there was never a just-in-case, it was always very peaceful arrangements,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:39.460
    | text      = but they wanted one guy who could stab somebody in the eye with their thumb
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:42.460
    | text      = if they needed to, and that was me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:43.460
    | text      = So I got to go along.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:45.460
    | text      = I got to sit at many different tables across from many different species
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:49.460
    | text      = while senior officers were having many different discussions,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:53.460
    | text      = initial negotiations, contract negotiations, treaty negotiations,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:56.460
    | text      = first contact meetings.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:58.460
    | text      = It was one of the most amazing things ever, and in that building, I've seenâ€¦
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:01.460
    | text      = Who are your favorites?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:03.460
    | text      = Yeah, that's a great question.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:05.460
    | text      = Here'sâ€¦
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:07.460
    | text      = Again, I haven't listened to enough episodes to have a good sense
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:11.460
    | text      = of who this interviewer is, but my sense of that is if that's your question,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:16.460
    | text      = you're not taking this very seriously anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:18.460
    | text      = You are notâ€¦
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:19.460
    | text      = Like, your question, who's your favorite alien?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:22.460
    | text      = That'sâ€¦
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:23.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:24.460
    | text      = I went to this intergalactic space station where they negotiated treaties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:28.460
    | text      = Who are you like best?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:30.460
    | text      = Another question, if you're taking this seriously, is like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:32.460
    | text      = oh, on what authority are those treaties held?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:35.460
    | text      = Totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:36.460
    | text      = Who enforces contract law in space?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:38.460
    | text      = Contract law?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:39.460
    | text      = Contract law.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:40.460
    | text      = We're really worried about contract law here?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:42.460
    | text      = Is thereâ€¦
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:43.460
    | text      = That must meanâ€¦
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:44.460
    | text      = Who's the JAG officer for space?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:46.460
    | text      = Well, that must mean, if there's other alien races coming to this space station
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:50.460
    | text      = for a negotiation, that must mean that we are already in a universal government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:56.460
    | text      = Correct.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:57.460
    | text      = Like, there must already be a oneâ€¦ not one world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:01.460
    | text      = A united galacticâ€¦
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:02.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:03.460
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:04.460
    | text      = Because otherwise, none of this could be enforceable in any way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:06.460
    | text      = Of course not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:07.460
    | text      = Okay, so we break a contract.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:10.460
    | text      = Do we get blown up?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:11.460
    | text      = I mean, maybe not blown up, but there'd have to be some sort of a penalty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:14.460
    | text      = There'd have to be some sort of consequence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:15.460
    | text      = From whoever can enforce these contracts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:18.460
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:19.460
    | text      = That would be something I'd like to hear.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:21.460
    | text      = But something else I'd like to hear is, what's your favorite alien?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 01:20:24.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 01:20:25.460
    | text      = Dan, we have a ready-made answer for the question if anybody's asked you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Spider leadership.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:31.460
    | text      = You like the feline?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:32.460
    | text      = Oh, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:33.460
    | text      = The Contessa's?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:34.460
    | text      = Yeah, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Yeah, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Well, Randy, he doesn't realize that that's an actual question that's being asked to him.

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = But it is.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:47.460

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Oh, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = You know, who are the most interesting and the ones that you like?

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:10.819
    | text      = He was being very blunt and direct and like, I can only express this as the person listening

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
